channel.title: Reading on Yao's World
channel.description: Recent content in Reading on Yao's World

item.title: Principles 2
item.description: 02/14/2023 49% The Habsburg Empire is not completely new to me, but I did not know much about it. Turns out it used to be a Germanic-centric family empire that spread across the European continent, from Spain to the west to the Ottoman Empire to the east. The Dutch broke free from the bigger empire in 1581 and soon became the wealthiest country in the world, with its currency the Dutch Gilders becoming the world’s reserve currency.
